message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I know you'll find valuable. Given its potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,350,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to make a serious investment in this product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value this product brings is substantial. I could meet you halfway at $1,275,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you at $1,200,000, but I need to get closer to my target. Can we discuss a price of $1,225,000?
